TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CurrentValueRecord extends System.Data.Objects.DbUpdatableDataRecord

Docs.summary: オブジェクト データの現在の値へのアクセスを提供します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 A <xref:System.Data.Objects.CurrentValueRecord> object contains a <xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataRecord> view of the object or relationship tracked by an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateEntry>.
<xref:System.Data.Objects.CurrentValueRecord> implements <xref:System.Data.IExtendedDataRecord>, which provides read\-only access to the current values of entities, relationships, and metadata.
Implements methods that allow updates to the current values.
## 例
